name: A. Hossam and Combinatorics
statement:
Hossam woke up bored, so he decided to create an interesting array with
his friend Hazem.Now, they have an array a of n positive integers,
Hossam will choose a number a_i and Hazem will choose a number a_j.Count
the number of interesting pairs (a_i, a_j) that meet all the following
conditions: 1
le i, j
le n; i
neq j; The absolute difference |a_i - a_j| must be equal to the maximum
absolute difference over all the pairs in the array. More formally,
|a_i - a_j| =
max_{1
le p, q
le n} |a_p - a_q|.
